item.description:
Patty recommended this hike and said it is about 3 miles long. We will meet in the parking lot which the website says is on Macintosh Rd. about 300 yards from Rt. 156 in Lyme.

The trail map: http://www.lymelandtr...

We will meet at 10:00am. We will wait about 15 minutes for any late stragglers. :)

Fell free to bring friends and extra pups. All are invited!!

Directions:
From Interstate 95 north or south:

Take exit 70 and follow Route 156 north, driving 6.6 miles and entering Lyme.
Just before the grade school, town hall and library, turn left onto MacIntosh Road.
At the first sharp bend in road (just past bridge), park at the dirt road on right.
The trail begins at the gate. Follow woods road, bear right to stream and preserve sign (about a quarter mile).
item.how_to_find_us: I will be there with Kalija and my blue Ford Edge
item.name: Pleasant Valley Preserve Hike
